hackathon-eligibility: Anyone 13 years of age or older may participate in the challenge.
hackathon-requirements: a new rule or set of rules for
hackathon-rules:
Submission Period: October 14, 2013 (3:00PM Eastern Time) - November 13, 2013 (5:00PM Eastern Time)
Judging Period: November 18, 2013 (11:00AM Eastern Time) - November 25, 2013 (5:00pm Eastern Time)
Voting Period: November 18, 2013 (11:00AM Eastern Time) - November 25, 2013 (5:00pm Eastern Time)
Winners Announced: On or around November 26, 2013 (5:00pm Eastern Time)
Submissions will be scored by the judges on the following criteria:
(i) Usefulness: How useful is the submission to the the HTML Inspector library or to the Web community?
(ii) Quality: Is the code bug free? Does it handle all possible use cases? Is it well written? Is it well tested?
The top two submissions based on the judges scores and the top two submission based on public voting on the challenge website will be recognized on the homepage.
Please see the 
 for voting rules and other terms that apply to your participation.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How useful is the submission to the the HTML Inspector library or to the Web community?
Is the code bug free? Does it handle all possible use cases? Is it well written? Is it well tested?

hackathon-description-header: Help developers automatically test their websites for accessibility, validation, conventions and best-practices.
